shrimp.name: OrenNayar
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Oren-Nayar diffuse term, based on Szymon Rusinkiewicz's implementation. The roughness parameter controls the standard deviation of angle orientations of the surface grooves, so when roughness = 0, the model is a Lambertian reflection. The diffuse color value is passed to the aov_surfacecolor, and the diffuse value to the aov_diffuse AOV presets.
